alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Leon County through 330 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A and M, Florida State University, Ralford Greenway, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Killearn Estates, Callen Neighborhood, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Midtown, Pisgah Church, Springsax Park, Apalachee Ridge Estates, Indian Head Acres, Baum and Bragg Stadium. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
